attributes.action: Get out of Human Rights Act Now, NOT when/if we vote fro Conservative
attributes.additional_details:
Recent reports suggest that the Conservative Government are asking the public to vote for them and in return for this vote they are promising to get out of the Human Rights Act, allowing the UK supeme court to be the final overruling court in the UK.

Please sign this petition to ask Mr Cameron and Thersa May to get us out of the Human Rights act during this period in power. Why are they not asking "We will do what the public want and get us out of the Human Rights Act now, if you give us your vote next time round. It shouldn't be vote ffor us and we will do this, we have seen to many broken prmoises from succsessive Goverments, give the public what they want first then be rewarded for it after!
